snippet: Everyone in attendance was blindfolded for the duration of the Lincoln Center Festival’s production of Lera Auerbach’s unconventional opera “The Blind.”
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews Lincoln Center Festival production of Lera Auerbach opera The Blind, which required all audience members to be blindfolded, at Kaplan Penthouse.
lead_paragraph: Everyone in attendance was blindfolded for the duration of the Lincoln Center Festival’s production of Lera Auerbach’s unconventional opera “The Blind.”
